---
title: "ECON2020 Final Project: Labor Market Tightness and Inflation"
author: Hyeonseo Lee
date: ""
---

I plan to find empirical evidence for the effect of labor market tightness on inflation. I wish to build on Benigno and Eggertsson (2023) who showed that an increase in labor market tightness (vacancy/unemployment) has contributed to a surge in inflation in the US during the 2020s.
